None.Name: Soul Shock
None.Description: Activate to release a shot of destructive energy that deals 370 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 500 in total. Needs to have gathered 900 life points from corpse first. Knocks back small units. Reusable every 3 seconds.

None.Name: Corpse Gathering
None.Description: Harvests energy from nearby corpses equal to their former maximum life points to enable Soul Shock. A maximum of 1800 life points can be stored at once.
